TopicTitle: South-West Launch Site - Kerbal Konstructs Content

Articles.Content:
> 
> 
> 2 hours ago, DiscoSlelge said:
> 
> 
> So [@Beale](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/70533-beale/) ~~the pad is still on the island~~ but underground... With 1.1 KerbalKonstruct the pad was on the list so problem here
> 
> 
> 
> 
>  
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Wait nope, in fact the pad is on a [really tiny Island](http://www.noelshack.com/2016-14-1459721873-3348b678a5.jpg) uppon the great first one
> 

Now I remember! Yes, I moved it there trying to find some flat surface.

When next working in this, I will place the pad on an artificial island at sea instead (avoids issues of people playing on different terrain quality).

> 
> 
> 3 minutes ago, Beale said:
> 
> 
> Now I remember! Yes, I moved it there trying to find some flat surface.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> When next working in this, I will place the pad on an artificial island at sea instead (avoids issues of people playing on different terrain quality).
> 

Can it be placed near that wonderful southmost three-islands there? Could it even have multiple sites?

> 
> 
> 5 minutes ago, Tangle said:
> 
> 
> Can it be placed near that wonderful southmost three-islands there? Could it even have multiple sites?
> 

Sure thing, just use the Kerbal Konstructs menu. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

You can have hundreds of copies of the launch site. 

In the future however, I would combine all separate pieces into a single monolith launch site (to avoid floating point placement errors) so it may not always be flexible like this.

Re-doing some of the assets. Based on beautiful Scotland.  

The general idea, the large shape is the mid-ocean/lake platform (easier than choosing terrain on Kerbin).  

Textures are from bac9's KSC and other misc places. Using pre-made speeds up development a lot.

**Old assets**  

The old assets are now free to use by anyone. 

![31c069815b.jpg](http://puu.sh/o8rKr/31c069815b.jpg)

![386bd5b513.jpg](http://puu.sh/o8rL6/386bd5b513.jpg)

![e4f617a879.jpg](http://puu.sh/o8rOx/e4f617a879.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2016-04-06T17:35:59Z" title="04/06/2016 05:35  PM" data-short="8 yr">April 6, 2016</time> by Beale**

**A little shed + prospective layout.**  

The vegatation area is for misc buildings, the asphalt area will house the VAB and administrative buildings.  

The launch pad will be some 100 metres from the edge of the platform, over a bridge.  

The radio will be housed on the block house on the far upper corner.

> 12 minutes ago, legoclone09 said:
> 
> 
> Aww, I liked the KSC style a lot more. Alternate textures, anyone?
> 

I'm feeling a little swayed on both sides, still need much experimentation to find a style I like.

The old textures were not so good, a lot of stretching and distortion. 

![17fba0ff53.jpg](http://puu.sh/oaLAa/17fba0ff53.jpg)  

The "rustic" textures are being nice for the small buildings, but for larger buildings like the VAB it's not going so well...

Horrible flashbacks to "the barn".

![579db383ee.jpg](http://puu.sh/oaLnR/579db383ee.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2016-04-08T15:16:26Z" title="04/08/2016 03:16  PM" data-short="8 yr">April 8, 2016</time> by Beale**

What I was thinking was using the KSC textures for the alternate textures, since I prefer those ones. Am I too needy? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")

> 
> 
> 1 minute ago, legoclone09 said:
> 
> 
> What I was thinking was using the KSC textures for the alternate textures, since I prefer those ones. Am I too needy? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")
> 

I wouldn't say too needy, those textures are just perhaps not the best fit ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)") 

These textures are nice, but I don't think the high resolution versions are available.   

What is more, they don't work in all situations.

![690052d117.jpg](http://puu.sh/oaLPO/690052d117.jpg)
Ok, it's just what I preferred. You could have them alternately and rarely update them, or just never update them.

> 
> 
> 21 minutes ago, legoclone09 said:
> 
> 
> Ok, it's just what I preferred. You could have them alternately and rarely update them, or just never update them.
> 

I think finding a happy medium between both will be better for all persons. Alternate textures are a mighty pain, look at Tantares ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif ":wink:") 

Some more feedback from others on these styles would be ***very*** helpful! Because I am very on the fence.
